about_the_game:
Dive into the golden age of gaming with TechStop Simulator, the ultimate retro management simulation that takes you back to the vibrant eras of arcades and game shops. In TechStop Simulator, you are given the reins to build and run your very own arcade or game shop, transforming your entrepreneurial dreams into a thriving business empire. Whether you have a passion for the buzzing atmosphere of arcade halls or the excitement of a bustling game shop, this game lets you create and manage every aspect of your business from the ground up.


As you step into the shoes of a business owner, you'll experience the thrill of designing and customizing your arcade or game shop, attracting a diverse array of customers with unique preferences and needs. Delve into the intricacies of inventory management, stocking up on the latest games and the most popular arcade cabinets to keep your clientele entertained and satisfied.


Hiring and managing staff is another crucial aspect of your role, ensuring your business runs smoothly and efficiently. From cashiers and technicians to sales associates and event coordinators, each staff member plays a vital role in the success of your venture. Organize and host exciting events such as game tournaments, midnight releases, and special promotions to draw in crowds and boost your profits.


But the excitement doesn't stop there. As your business flourishes, you'll have the opportunity to expand your store, increasing its size and capabilities. Unlock new areas, add more game cabinets, or introduce new product lines to cater to an ever-growing customer base. Customize your expanded space with themed decorations and advanced features to create an even more captivating environment for your patrons.


Immerse yourself in the nostalgia of retro aesthetics, with pixel art graphics and a nostalgic soundtrack that brings back the charm of the past. As you navigate the challenges of running a business, you'll need to balance your budget, set competitive prices, and make strategic decisions to expand and grow your empire.

TechStop Simulator offers an engaging and immersive experience that captures the essence of the golden age of gaming and retail. Whether you're reliving fond memories or discovering the magic for the first time, this game provides endless opportunities for creativity, strategy, and fun. Get ready to build your dream arcade or game shop, expand it into a legendary venue, and become a renowned entrepreneur in TechStop Simulator!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 @ 3,3 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 @ 3,2 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Prepare for an immersive retro arcade & game shop management experience. Take control of your very own TechStop! Stock your shelves with games and arcade classics, set prices, manage payments, hire staff, expand & design your store to attract more customers. Stay ahead in competitive local market!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
